The squadron in which Rost6v was serving had scarcely time to mount before it was halted facing the enemy. Again, as at the Enns bridge, there was nothing between the squadron and the enemy, and again that terrible dividing line of uncertainty and fearresembling the line separating the living from the dead lay between them.
